GET '/api'.description: Serves up a list of all endpoints and their queries

GET '/api/destinations'.description: Serves up an array of all destination objects

queries.points_balance: Can be queried with integers. Will serve up destinations where an economy off-peak ticket costs less than the points balance queried.
queries.travel_class: Can be queried with 'economy', 'p_economy' and 'business'. Returns destinations with fares available in queried class. Combine with a points_balance query to return destinations where points balance can afford a seat in queried class.
queries.limit: Can be queried with integers. Limits amount of results served to the queried number - defaults to 20 results.
queries.page: Can be queried with integers. Specifies page of results to return; default page size is 20 results, but this can be modified using the limit query.
